info.title: Lodgify Public API v2
info.description: API documentation for Lodgify Public API v2

get.description: Returns a paged list of all properties

parameters.name: updatedSince
parameters.description: DateTime so the returned list will only include the properties modified since this datetime

parameters.name: includeCount
parameters.description: Boolean, if true it will return the total number of results

parameters.name: includeInOut
parameters.description: Boolean, if true the results will include available dates for arrival or departure

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of the page to retrieve

count.description: Total number of items available. Only returned if includeCount = true

hide_address.description: Owner requested to hide address from public

city.description: City name where the property is located

state.description: Region name where the property is located

country.description: Country name where the property is located

has_addons.description: Boolean indicating if the property has available addons

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days. This field indicates the number of days of stay the MinPrice and MaxPrice are
So if we have a 30 PriceUnitInDays, it means the MinPrice and MaxPrice are Monthly prices
If multiple prices per diferent periods are defined it will return daily prices

created_at.description: DateTime of creation

is_active.description: Boolean indicating ig the property is active or not (meaning if is linked to a valid website)

items.description: Object that retuns information for a property
List of properties for current page

schema.description: Paged list of Properties Object.

count.description: Total number of items available. Only returned if includeCount = true

city.description: City name where the property is located

state.description: Region name where the property is located

country.description: Country name where the property is located

has_addons.description: Boolean indicating if the property has available addons

schema.description: Object that retuns information for a property

get.description: Returns all the roomtypes available for a given property

images.description: List of images associated with this room

amenities.description: List of amenities available of the room

breakfast_included.description: A boolean value indicating if the breakfast is included in the price of the booking.

has_parking.description: A boolean value indicating if there is a parking spot available.

adults_only.description: A boolean value indicating if the property is only available for adults.

pets_allowed.description: A boolean value indicating if the property allows pets.

image_url.description: URL address of the image of the room.

max_people.description: Maximum number of people the room can host.

units.description: Number of units (same room type) that this room has.

has_wifi.description: A boolean value indicating if the property has wifi available.

has_meal_plan.description: A boolean value indicating if the property has a meal plan available.

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the room.

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the room.

area_unit.description: This value indicates if the area is given in square feet(sqf) or square meters(sqm).

area.description: This value indicates how many meters/feet the unit has; the value is given in the unit of measure set in the parameter area_unit.

min_price.description: Minimal price the booking will cost; this parameter is always given in euros.

original_min_price.description:
This parameter is the same as min_price (minimal price the booking will cost) but given in the currency of the owner - any currency that can be passed to the system.
A list of all available currencies can be found in the section CurrenciesApi.The currency used here is specified by the parameters in “currency”.

max_price.description: Maximum price the booking will cost; this parameter is always given in euros.

original_max_price.description:
This parameter is the same as max_price (maximum price the booking will cost) but given in the currency of the owner - any currency that can be passed to the system.
A list of all available currencies can be found in the section CurrenciesApi.The currency used here is specified by the parameters in “currency”.

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days.
This field indicates the number of days of stay the min_price and max_price are.So if we have a 30 price_unit_in_days, it means the min_price and max_price are Monthly prices.If multiple prices per different periods are defined it will return daily prices

get.description: Returns a paged list of all deleted properties since some date

parameters.name: deletedSince
parameters.description: DateTime so the returned list will only include the properties deleted since this datetime

get.description: Returns daily rates calendar for room types requested by roomTypeId or houseId.
Returns rate settings for the houseId.
Lists availability information for a given period for the calling user.
Lists availability information for a given period for a specific property of the calling user.
Lists availability information for a given period for a specific room in a property of the calling user.
Retrieve a list of bookings matching the query parameters

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of the page to retrieve

parameters.name: stayFilter
parameters.description: Filter Bookings by the stay dates

parameters.name: updatedSince
parameters.description: Include only Bookings updated since this date

parameters.name: includeTransactions
parameters.description: Include details about transactions and schedule

parameters.name: trash
parameters.description: Query bookings that are in trash

parameters.name: stayFilterDate
parameters.description: Date to filter when selected ArrivalDate or DepartureDate in stayFilter

room_type_id.description: Id of the room type booked

people.description: Amount of people that will occupy the room type

key_code.description: KeyCode to access the property or room rented

items.description: Room information related to the Booking

country_code.description: Code of the country the Guest is from

guest.description: Guest information related to the Booking

tentative_expires_at.description: Time the Tentative status will expire at

source.description: Type of source the Booking comes from

source_text.description: Details of the booking from the source

created_from_ip.description: Ip the booking was created from

created_at.description: Time the booking was created at

updated_at.description: Last time the booking was updated

canceled_at.description: Date the booking was canceled at

is_new.description: When it is new, the owner has not seen the booking yet

is_deleted.description: When it is deleted, the owner moved the booking to trash

currency_code.description: Currency in which all amounts are expressed for this booking

damage_deposit.description: Description of the damage deposit policy

policy.description: Policy information related to the Booking

due_at.description:
The date the schedule item will be due at. 
Null means that the date will be the date of the booking agreement.

items.description: Transaction scheduled in the Quote

scheduled_transactions.description: Schedule details enforced by the Quote

due_at.description:
The date the schedule item will be due at. 
Null means that the date will be the date of the booking agreement.

items.description: Transaction scheduled in the Quote

scheduled_damage_protection.description: Schedule details of damage protection enforced by the Quote

prices.description: Items belonging to the Quote related to this Room type

room_type_items.description: Room types belonging to the Quote

other_items.description: Other items belonging to the Quote

vat_items.description: Vat items belonging to the Quote

quote.description: Quote information related to the Booking

status.description: Information about the status of the Transaction

payment_type.description: Information about the payment type of the Transaction

processed_at.description: The time the transaction was processed at

items.description: Information about each transaction of the Booking

is_deleted.description: When it is deleted, the owner moved the booking to trash

succeeded.description:
When true, the payment link has been created with the specified amount.
When false, the payment link could not be created because there is a scheduled payment which is pending or the requested amount could not be enforced.

hide_address.description: Owner requested to hide address from public

city.description: City name where the property is located

state.description: Region name where the property is located

country.description: Country name where the property is located

has_addons.description: Boolean indicating if the property has available addons

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days. This field indicates the number of days of stay the MinPrice and MaxPrice are
So if we have a 30 PriceUnitInDays, it means the MinPrice and MaxPrice are Monthly prices
If multiple prices per diferent periods are defined it will return daily prices

created_at.description: DateTime of creation

is_active.description: Boolean indicating ig the property is active or not (meaning if is linked to a valid website)

Lodgify.Api.Properties.Models.v2.Propert.description: Object that retuns information for a property

count.description: Total number of items available. Only returned if includeCount = true

hide_address.description: Owner requested to hide address from public

city.description: City name where the property is located

state.description: Region name where the property is located

country.description: Country name where the property is located

has_addons.description: Boolean indicating if the property has available addons

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days. This field indicates the number of days of stay the MinPrice and MaxPrice are
So if we have a 30 PriceUnitInDays, it means the MinPrice and MaxPrice are Monthly prices
If multiple prices per diferent periods are defined it will return daily prices

created_at.description: DateTime of creation

is_active.description: Boolean indicating ig the property is active or not (meaning if is linked to a valid website)

items.description: Object that retuns information for a property
List of properties for current page

images.description: List of images associated with this room

amenities.description: List of amenities available of the room

breakfast_included.description: A boolean value indicating if the breakfast is included in the price of the booking.

has_parking.description: A boolean value indicating if there is a parking spot available.

adults_only.description: A boolean value indicating if the property is only available for adults.

pets_allowed.description: A boolean value indicating if the property allows pets.

image_url.description: URL address of the image of the room.

max_people.description: Maximum number of people the room can host.

units.description: Number of units (same room type) that this room has.

has_wifi.description: A boolean value indicating if the property has wifi available.

has_meal_plan.description: A boolean value indicating if the property has a meal plan available.

bedrooms.description: Number of bedrooms in the room.

bathrooms.description: Number of bathrooms in the room.

area_unit.description: This value indicates if the area is given in square feet(sqf) or square meters(sqm).

area.description: This value indicates how many meters/feet the unit has; the value is given in the unit of measure set in the parameter area_unit.

min_price.description: Minimal price the booking will cost; this parameter is always given in euros.

original_min_price.description:
This parameter is the same as min_price (minimal price the booking will cost) but given in the currency of the owner - any currency that can be passed to the system.
A list of all available currencies can be found in the section CurrenciesApi.The currency used here is specified by the parameters in “currency”.

max_price.description: Maximum price the booking will cost; this parameter is always given in euros.

original_max_price.description:
This parameter is the same as max_price (maximum price the booking will cost) but given in the currency of the owner - any currency that can be passed to the system.
A list of all available currencies can be found in the section CurrenciesApi.The currency used here is specified by the parameters in “currency”.

price_unit_in_days.description:
Price unit in days.
This field indicates the number of days of stay the min_price and max_price are.So if we have a 30 price_unit_in_days, it means the min_price and max_price are Monthly prices.If multiple prices per different periods are defined it will return daily prices
